features.Name: kml_1
features.overview: Take in the region's newest and largest museum of modern Singapore and Southeast Asian art housed within two of Singapore's awe-inspiring national monuments
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Take in the region's newest and largest museum of modern Singapore and Southeast Asian art housed within two of Singapore's awe-inspiring national monuments
features.OPENING_HOURS: Effective from 24 November 2015, Sunday to Thursday and  public holidays,10am - 7pm ,Friday to Saturday and  eve of public holidays, 10am - 10pm

features.Name: kml_2
features.overview: Also known as Masjid Sultan, the impressive Sultan Mosque in historic Kampong Glam is the focal point for Singapore's Muslim community
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The impressive Sultan Mosque (also known as Masjid Sultan) in historic Kampong Glam is the focal point for Singapore's Muslim community

features.Name: kml_3
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Sri Mariamman Temple's ornate and elaborate detailing makes it a wonder to behold
features.overview: Located in Chinatown, the Sri Mariamman Temple dates back to 1827 and is the oldest Hindu temple in Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Sri Mariamman Temple, located in Chinatown, is the oldest Hindu temple in Singapore

features.Name: kml_4
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Armenian Church in Singapore is a 19th-century architectural masterpiece
features.overview: The oldest Christian church in Singapore is an architectural masterpiece from the early 19th century
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Armenian Church is the oldest Christian church in Singapore and an architectural masterpiece from the early 19th century

features.Name: kml_5
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The charm of CHIJMES, Singapore harks back to a bygone, gracious age
features.overview: Whether functioning as a school or a lifestyle and entertainment complex, it appears the beauty of CHIJMES is only equalled by its versatility
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Who would have thought a former school would make such a graceful transition? As a lifestyle and entertainment complex, CHIJMES soars high above the rest
features.OPENING_HOURS: Daily, 24 hours,Opening hours of businesses in CHIJMES may vary.

features.Name: kml_6
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Singapore's largest cathedral is worth a visit for its architectural beauty
features.pageTitle: St Andrew's Cathedral- Singapore Architecture Landmark
features.overview: Singapore's largest cathedral is a stellar example of colonial-era architecture and heritage
features.META_DESCRIPTION: St Andrew's Cathedral is Singapore's largest cathedral and a stellar example of colonial-era architecture and heritage

features.Name: kml_10
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Learn more about local Chinese culture at the Singapore Chinatown Heritage Centre
features.overview: Experience how Singapore's early Chinese migrants once lived and learn more about local Chinese culture at the Chinatown Heritage Centre
features.META_DESCRIPTION: At the Chinatown Heritage Centre, experience how Singapore's early Chinese migrants once lived and learn more about local Chinese culture

features.Name: kml_11
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Thian Hock Keng Temple in Singapore is dedicated to Mazu, the Goddess of the Sea
features.overview: Beautifully restored, Thian Hock Keng Temple is the oldest Chinese temple in Singapore and dedicated to Mazu, the Goddess of the Sea
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Thian Hock Keng Temple is the oldest Chinese temple in Singapore and dedicated to Mazu, the Goddess of the Sea.

features.Name: kml_12
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Discover the history and culture of the Eurasian community in Singapore
features.overview: This engaging heritage attraction takes you through the history and culture of the Eurasian community in Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: This engaging heritage attraction takes you through the history and culture of the Eurasian community in Singapore
features.OPENING_HOURS: Tuesday to Sunday, 9am - 6pm, Closed on Monday

features.Name: kml_13
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The varying styles of Singapore's shophouses are a showcase of our evolving architecture
features.overview: With many beautifully preserved examples on hand today, the shophouses in Singapore are prime examples of timeless architectural appeal
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Few buildings epitomise our culture as fully as the shophouse, with its surprisingly harmonious mix of diverse design elements

features.Name: kml_14
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Capitol Building's distinctive facade adds a touch of grandeur to the cityscape
features.overview: The queen of Singapore cinemas will soon reclaim her crown as the premier entertainment hub when Capitol Building reopens next year
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Now undergoing massive restoration works, Capitol Building will emerge as Singapore's premier entertainment hub next year

features.Name: kml_15
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Catch a world-class opera or pop concert at Singapore's premier performing arts centre
features.overview: This boldly designed performing arts centre has become a memorable part of Singapore's skyline
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Esplanade is boldly designed performing arts centre that has become a memorable part of Singapore's skyline

features.Name: kml_16
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Gardens by the Bay seamlessly blends sleek design, cutting-edge technology and fun
features.overview: The lush and beautiful Gardens by the Bay is dominated by the sleekly sculptured biodomes - marvels of architecture, design and engineering
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Biodomes, baobabs and the blossoming bounty of every conceivable plant will bowl you over at Gardens by the Bay.

features.Name: kml_17
features.overview: There's more than meets the eye in The Interlace's artful arrangement of residential blocks
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Few buildings demonstrate out-of-the-box thinking as well as The Interlace, an intriguingly designed residential complex.

features.Name: kml_18
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Pamper yourself and save the world at the same time at PARKROYAL on Pickering
features.overview: PARKROYAL on Pickering is a luxurious garden oasis in downtown Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: PARKROYAL on Pickering is a luxurious garden oasis in downtown Singapore

features.Name: kml_20
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The serene Kranji War Memorial, Singapore is a hillside cemetery set in a quiet neighbourhood
features.pageTitle: Kranji War Memorial Landmark in Singapore
features.overview: The Kranji War Memorial in Singapore honours the men and women from the Commonwealth who died in the line of duty during World War II
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Kranji War Memorial in Singapore honours the men and women from the Commonwealth who died in the line of duty during World War II

features.Name: kml_21
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Indian National Army Monument tells an intriguing story of Singapore's past
features.pageTitle: Indian National Army (INA) Monument in Singapore
features.overview: This marker at Esplanade Park was one of the eleven World War II markers erected in 1995 to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the end of World War II
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Indian National Army (INA) Monument at Esplanade Park is a memorial that was built in 1995 to mark the 50th anniversary of the end of World War II

features.Name: kml_22
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Reflections at Bukit Chandu is housed in a lovingly restored colonial bungalow
features.pageTitle: Reflections at Bukit Chandu: Singapore War Memorial
features.overview: This heritage centre relives the Battle of Pasir Panjang, one of the fiercest battles fought against the Japanese in Singapore during World War II
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Reflections at Bukit Chandu relives the Battle of Pasir Panjang, one of the fiercest battles fought against the Japanese in Singapore during World War II
features.OPENING_HOURS: Tuesday to Sunday, 9am - 5.30pm,Closed on Monday (except on public holidays)

features.Name: kml_23
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Surrounded by lush green, The Cenotaph sits at a quiet spot amid the city buzz
features.pageTitle: The Cenotaph - a Singapore War Memorial Landmark
features.overview: This war memorial in Esplanade Park honours the heroes who fought and died during World War I and World War II
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Cenotaph in Singapore is a war memorial in Esplanade Park that honours the heroes who fought and died during World War I and World War II

features.Name: kml_24
features.pageTitle: The Civilian War Memorial park in Singapore
features.ADDRESS: Bras Basah Road & Beach Road intersection
features.overview: Situated at the War Memorial Park in Beach Road, this memorial commemorates civilian victims of the Japanese Occupation in Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Civilian War Memorial and park in Beach Road commemorates Singapore's civilian victims of the Japanese Occupation during World War II.

features.Name: kml_25
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Sri Veeramakaliamman Temple is a distinctive landmark in the heart of Little India
features.pageTitle: Sri Veeramakaliamman Temple: Hindu Temple in Singapore
features.overview: Sri Veeramakaliamman Temple is one of Singapore's oldest Hindu temples, in the heart of Little India
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Sri Veeramakaliamman Temple is one of Singapore's oldest Hindu temples, in the heart of Little India

features.Name: kml_26
features.overview: The Maghain Aboth Synagogue is a gem in more ways than one, providing both a snapshot of history and a glimpse into a rich culture
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The simple exterior of the Maghain Aboth Synagogue gives no indication of its richly elegant interiors
features.OPENING_HOURS: Visits are available only by appointment. For more information, email jewishwb@singnet.com.sg or call +65 6337 2189 (ext. 103)

features.Name: kml_27
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Old Supreme Court lends a stately presence to the heart of Singapore city
features.overview: From dispensing justice to displaying art, the Old Supreme Court undergoes an overhaul for its new role as the National Gallery Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Due to reopen as the National Gallery Singapore, the Old Supreme Court is in itself a masterpiece of classical art.

features.Name: kml_28
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The charm of Tiong Bahru comes to life through its Art Deco architecture
features.ADDRESS: Seng Poh Road and Tiong Bahru Road
features.overview: Take a walk back in time through the Art Deco architecture in the heritage neighbourhood of Tiong Bahru
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Art Deco elegance of the flats in Tiong Bahru speak of the richness of a vanished world

features.Name: kml_29
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Lau Pa Sat blends graceful colonial architecture, heritage and delicious food
features.overview: The grande dame of markets in Singapore, Lau Pa Sat blends history, striking architecture and scrumptious local food into one heady experience.
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The historic market Lau Pa Sat offers a winning combination of graceful colonial architecture, a longstanding heritage and delicious food.

features.Name: kml_30
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Delve into the rich heritage and culture of Singapore's Malay community
features.overview: The Malay Heritage Centre is a must-visit if you're keen on learning about the rich heritage and culture of Singapore's Malay community.
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Malay Heritage Centre is a must-visit if you're keen on learning about the rich heritage and culture of Singapore's Malay community
features.OPENING_HOURS: Malay Heritage Centre Museum, Tuesday to Sunday, 10am - 6pm, Closed on Monday, Malay Heritage Centre Compound, Tuesday to Sunday, 8am - 8pm, Friday and Saturday, 8am - 10pm, Closed on Monday

features.Name: kml_31
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Many communities, one nation. Find out more about our people, such as the ubiquitous Peranakans
features.overview: Get to know Singapore's vibrant Peranakan community and history at this top-notch museum, filled with fine artefacts and fun exhibits
features.META_DESCRIPTION: At the Peranakan Museum, get to know Singapore's vibrant Peranakan community and its eclectic culture and history with fun and interactive exhibits

features.Name: kml_32
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The iconic Raffles Hotel has been home to both tall tales and famous folks
features.overview: Hark back to a golden age of elegant refinement and gracious living at Raffles Singapore, where the past reawakens to glorious life
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Sip a Singapore Sling beneath the whirling fans at the Long Bar, and let the tranquil charms of Raffles Singapore bring you back into another era

features.Name: kml_33
features.overview: A former British military camp is now Asia's new Destination for Contemporary Art
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Gillman Barracks Singapore is Asia's vibrant new destination for the creation, exhibition and discussion of contemporary art
features.OPENING_HOURS: Tuesday to Saturday, 11am - 7pm, Sunday, 11am - 6pm , Galleries closed on Monday and public holidays.

features.Name: kml_34
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The ArtScience Museum in Singapore hosts a variety of international touring exhibitions
features.overview: Catch world-class touring exhibitions at this premier exhibition space
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Catch world-class touring exhibitions at the ArtScience Museum at Marina Bay Sands

features.Name: kml_35
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: SAM at 8Q is the funkier sister of the Singapore Art Museum
features.overview: An extension of the Singapore Art Museum, SAM at 8Q features contemporary art exhibitions and is home to a Moving Image Gallery, where film screenings are held
features.META_DESCRIPTION: SAM at 8Q at the Singapore Art Museum showcases the works of Singapore contemporary artists

features.Name: kml_36
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Jamae Mosque in Singapore is one of the oldest mosques in Singapore
features.overview: Also known as Masjid Chulia, Jamae Mosque is one of Singapore's oldest mosques and a prominent landmark in Chinatown since the 1820s
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Jamae Mosque (or Masjid Chulia) is one of Singapore's oldest mosques and a prominent landmark in Chinatown since the 1820s

features.Name: kml_37
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Be inspired by the architecture and creativity at the Institute of Contemporary Arts, Singapore
features.ADDRESS: LASALLE College of the Arts, 1 McNally Street
features.overview: This experimental art space housed in a tertiary arts college will help you deepen your understanding of contemporary art
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Housed in a tertiary arts college, the Institute of Contemporary Arts Singapore will help you deepen your appreciation for experimental artworks
features.OPENING_HOURS: Tuesday to Sunday, 12pm - 7pm, Closed on Monday and public holidays

features.Name: kml_38
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Marvel at spectacular panoramas of the city skyline from the Singapore Flyer
features.overview: This giant observation wheel offers 360-degree city views, a panorama that stretches to parts of Malaysia and Indonesia on a clear day
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Singapore Flyer not only offers you stunning views of the city, but is one of the city's most recognisable architectural icons

features.Name: kml_39
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The breathtaking Marina Bay Sands is a sheer modern architectural triumph
features.overview: A feat of engineering, an architectural statement and a sheer aesthetic triumph, Marina Bay Sands<sup>Â®</sup> has upped the ante for buildings in Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Superlatives naturally spring to mind when beholding Marina Bay SandsÂ®. Its bold, swooping curves, steep slopes, and soaring spaces defy gravity and evoke awe
features.OPENING_HOURS: SkyPark Operating Hours - Monday to Thursday, 9:30am - 10pm, Friday to Sunday, 9:30am - 11pm, Shoppes Daily, 10am - 10pm (hours vary by store)

features.Name: kml_40
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: More than just an ordinary dam, the Marina Barrage is an ideal recreational space
features.overview: This innovative facility not only supplies water to Singaporeans and helps alleviate floods but also doubles up as a place for family fun
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Marina Barrage not only supplies water to Singaporeans and helps alleviate floods but also doubles up as a place for family fun
features.OPENING_HOURS: Marina Barrage - All day  Information Counter Daily, 9am - 9pm

features.Name: kml_41
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Explore some of the city's best parks and trails, such as the Southern Ridges Walk
features.overview: Lush jungle is broken up with a seriously creative twist in the fantastic form of the Henderson Waves bridge.
features.META_DESCRIPTION: With the Henderson Waves bridge, form meets function to stunning effect

features.Name: kml_42
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Pinnacle@Duxton's architecture is a refreshing change in a sea of concrete blocks
features.overview: The soaring lines and stunning views of majestic residential estate Pinnacle at Duxton will make you forget your fear of heights. Almost
features.META_DESCRIPTION: With its lofty towers and dizzying sky gardens, the Pinnacle at Duxton takes residential living to soaring new heights

features.Name: kml_43
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Hajjah Fatimah Mosque in Singapore features an intriguing blend of cross-cultural architectural influences
features.overview: The Hajjah Fatimah Mosque will captivate you with its intriguing blend of cross-cultural architectural influences
features.META_DESCRIPTION: With its tilting European-style minaret and Chinese tiling, the Hajjah Fatimah Mosque is one of the most unique mosques in Singapore

features.Name: kml_44
features.pageTitle: Haw Par Villa: Singapore Theme Park
features.overview: Embark on an unforgettable journey into Chinese folklore and mythology at the Haw Par Villa theme park.
features.META_DESCRIPTION: A visit to the Haw Par Villa theme park is an unforgettable journey into Chinese folklore and mythology.

features.Name: kml_45
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Beautifully preserved architecture and artefacts make the NUS Baba House a must-visit
features.pageTitle: NUS Baba House - Singapore Peranakan Architecture
features.overview: This heritage house lends rich insight into Singapore's Peranakan community, thanks to beautifully preserved architecture and artefacts
features.META_DESCRIPTION: NUS Baba House is a heritage house that gives a rich look at Singapore's Peranakan community, thanks to beautifully preserved architecture and artefacts
features.OPENING_HOURS: Visits are by appointment only.Visitors must sign up in advance for heritage tours which fall on:Monday, 2pm - 3pm,Tuesday, 6.30pm - 7.30pm,Thursday, 10am - 11am,Saturday, 11am - 12pm

features.Name: kml_46
features.overview: Restored by expert craftsmen from China, the Hong San See temple has been brought back to its full glory
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Dancing dragons and prancing phoenixes are just some of the visual delights to catch at the exquisitely restored Hong San See temple

features.Name: kml_47
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Explore questions on ethnic identity such as what it means to be a Chinese
features.overview: The Chinese Heritage Centre in Singapore is where you can find out more about overseas Chinese communities and their culture
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Chinese Heritage Centre in Singapore is where you can find out more about overseas Chinese communities and their culture
features.OPENING_HOURS: Monday to Friday, 9.30am - 5pm,Saturday and Sunday, 10am -5pm, Closed on public holidays

features.Name: kml_48
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Delve into Malay culture at the heart of its community, Kampong Glam Singapore
features.pageTitle: Kampong Glam & Malay Culture in Singapore
features.overview: Discover Kampong Glam's rich history, living traditions, excellent eateries and trendy shops in this vibrant neighbourhood
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Discover the heart of Singapore's Malay community, living traditions, excellent eateries and trendy shops in vibrant Kampong Glam

features.Name: kml_49
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Contemporary Arts Center hosts exhibitions, live performances, film screenings and talks by visiting artists and curators
features.overview: This university arts research centre explores contemporary art through exhibitions, public programmes, residencies and research programmes
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Contemporary Arts Center at the Nanyang Technological University uses a variety of medium to explore contemporary art
features.OPENING_HOURS: Tuesday to Sunday, 12pm - 7pm Friday, 12pm - 9pm , Closed on Monday. Open on public holiday.

features.Name: kml_50
features.pageTitle: The Substation, Singapore Contemporary Art Centre
features.overview: This experimental arts centre gives a space for contemporary artists to try out new concepts
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Substation is an experimental arts centre that gives a space for contemporary artists to try out new concepts
features.OPENING_HOURS: The Substation Box Office ,Monday to Friday, 12pm - 2pm and 5pm - 8pm.Saturday and Sunday, open an hour prior to weekend showtimes. Closed on public holidays.The Substation Gallery Daily, 12pm - 9pm Closed on public holidays

features.Name: kml_51
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Award-winning exhibits at the Red Dot Design Museum in Singapore are sure to delight design fans
features.overview: This museum holds more than 1,000 award-winning products, communications and concepts that will delight design fans
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Red Dot Design Museum holds more than 1,000 products and items that are winners for their good design.
features.OPENING_HOURS: Monday - Friday, 11am - 6 pm, Saturday and Sunday, 11am - 8 pm

features.Name: kml_52
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Get to know the works of contemporary artists around Southeast Asia at the Singapore Art Museum
features.overview: Singapore Art Museum is Singapore's contemporary art museum, focused on Southeast Asian contemporary art
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Singapore Art Museum houses the world's largest public collection of contemporary Southeast Asian artworks

features.Name: kml_53
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Get your dose of creativity at Esplanade Theatres on the Bay, Singapore's premier arts centre
features.PHOTOCREDITS: Mori Hidetaka, Courtesy of Esplanade - Theatres on the Bay
features.overview: Catch a non-stop line-up of world-class performances at Singapore's premier arts centre
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Esplanade Theatres on the Bay is the country's premier arts centre as well as an iconic landmark on the city's skyline
features.OPENING_HOURS: Box Office Opening Hours Daily, 12pm - 8.30pm, The Esplanade Box Office will open 1 hour prior to show commencement for shows before 12 noon and will remain open up to half an hour after show commencement for shows starting after 8.30pm.

features.Name: kml_54
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Explore the wonderful world of design at the National Design Centre, Singapore
features.overview: The National Design Centre is the nexus for all things design. It hosts design exhibitions, events and programmes that will quicken the pulse of design lovers
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The National Design Centre is a design lover's dream destination

features.Name: kml_55
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Catch world-class performances at stunning venues, like The Victoria Theatre and Concert Hall
features.overview: After a four-year refurbishment, the Victoria Theatre and Concert Hall has since reopened, with its first official concert held there in August 2014
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The historic Victoria Theatre and Concert Hall has been transformed to meet the needs of a modern audience

features.Name: kml_56
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The NUS Museum in Singapore houses more than 8,000 exhibits that take you back to the past
features.ADDRESS: 50 Kent Ridge Crescent, National University of Singapore
features.overview: Get a deeper insight into Asian art and artefacts at this museum on the campus of the National University of Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Get a deeper insight into Asian art and artefacts at NUS Museum at Singapore's leading university

features.Name: kml_57
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Sun Yat Sen Memorial Hall pays tribute to the revolutionary leader
features.overview: This revamped museum is a fitting tribute to the intriguing life and times of Chinese revolutionary leader Dr Sun Yat Sen
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Sun Yat Sen Memorial Hall is a fitting tribute to the intriguing life and times of Chinese revolutionary leader Dr Sun Yat Sen
features.OPENING_HOURS: Tuesday to Sunday, 10am - 5pm, Closed on Monday

features.Name: kml_58
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Asian Civilizations Museum, Singapore is a historic building that tells the story of Asian civilisation
features.overview: Housed in a historical building by the Singapore River, this museum tells the stories of Asian civilisations through its permanent collections
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Housed in a historical building by the Singapore River, this museum is a microcosm of Asian civilisations spread over 11 galleries

features.Name: kml_59
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The National Museum of Singapore building is also an architectural icon that is stunning to behold
features.overview: Singapore's oldest museum is a progressive showcase of the country's history and culture
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The National Museum of Singapore is a progressive showcase of the country's history and culture
features.OPENING_HOURS: Singapore History Gallery Daily, 10am - 6pm,Last admission at 5.30pm.Singapore Living Galleries Daily, 10am - 8pm Free admission from 6pm -8pm , Last admission at 7.30pm

features.Name: kml_60
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Japanese Cemetery Park holds the ashes of thousands of Japanese soldiers, marines and airmen killed during World War II
features.overview: Located in Hougang, this is the largest Japanese cemetery in Southeast Asia and the burial ground of Singapore's early Japanese community
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Japanese Cemetery Park is the largest Japanese cemetery in Southeast Asia, containing nearly 1,000 graves of Singapore's early Japanese community

features.Name: kml_61
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Dalhousie Obelisk is a historically significant piece of Singapore architecture
features.overview: Dalhousie Obelisk at Empress Place is a famous architectural landmark in Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Dalhousie Obelisk at Empress Place is a famous architectural landmark in Singapore

features.Name: kml_62
features.pageTitle: Raffles Statue - Sir Stamford Raffles Landing Site
features.overview: The sculpture depicts Sir Stamford Raffles, founder of modern Singapore. Two statues exist, at the Raffles Landing Site and Empress Place
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Raffles Statue depicts the founder of modern Singapore, Sir Stamford Raffles. Two statues exist today, at the Raffles Landing Site and Empress Place

features.Name: kml_63
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Take a colourful trip back in time at this Singapore museum dedicated to postage stamps and related materials
features.overview: The Singapore Philatelic Museum offers windows into Singapore and the world through stamps
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Philatelic Museum offers visitors postage stamp-sized windows into Singapore and the rest of the world

features.Name: kml_64
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The site of the first Ford plant in Southeast Asia, the Old Ford Factory in Singapore is a journey to the past
features.overview: The Old Ford Factory holds an archive of memories about Singapore's wartime occupation by the Japanese
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Old Ford Factory is a repository of memories about the hardships endured during the Japanese Occupation of Singapore

features.Name: kml_65
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Explore the city of Singapore through its coins and notes over the years at the Singapore Coins and Notes Museum
features.pageTitle: Singapore Coins and Notes Museum & Museum Singapore
features.overview: The rare collection of currencies on display here tells Singapore's story through the money it has used over the years
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Singapore Coins and Notes Museum tells the story of Singapore through the currencies it has used over the years

features.Name: kml_66
features.overview: The Singapore City Gallery tells the story of the city's physical transformation
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The Singapore City Gallery tells the story of the city's physical transformation

features.Name: kml_67
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Explore our wartime past by learning about the Fall of Singapore and the infamous Changi Prison
features.overview: Changi Museum provides an emotional exploration of Singapore's wartime history during the Japanese Occupation
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Changi Museum provides an emotional exploration of Singapore's wartime history during the Japanese Occupation

features.Name: kml_68
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: More than 50,000 vintage toys from as many as 40 countries are on display at this Singapore toy museum
features.pageTitle: MINT Museum of Toys Singapore & Toy Museum
features.overview: This toy museum will delight both adults and kids with the vast collection of vintage toys and memorabilia from around the world
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Singapore's MINT Museum of Toys' vast collection of vintage toys will delight both kids and adults

features.Name: kml_69
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: The Lim Bo Seng Memorial commemorates one of Singapore's heroes from World War II
features.overview: This gazetted national monument at Esplanade Park commemorates one of Singapore's heroes from World War II
features.META_DESCRIPTION: The gazetted Lim Bo Seng Memorial at Esplanade Park commemorates one of Singapore's heroes from World War II

features.Name: kml_70
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Southeast Asia's first Hollywood movie theme park offers a dizzying selection of entertainment offerings
features.overview: Step into the glamorous world of movies at this world-class theme park located within Resorts World Sentosaâ„¢
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Universal Studios Singaporeâ„¢ at Resorts Worldâ„¢ Sentosa is a movie-themed entertainment park that the whole family can enjoy
features.OPENING_HOURS: Open daily at 10am.Closing time varies. Please visit the official website for more information.

features.Name: kml_71
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Adults and kids of all ages who are not even science buffs will have fun at the Singapore Science Centre
features.overview: This enlightening attraction holds the largest collection of educational materials devoted to science in Singapore
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Singapore Science Centre holds the largest collection of educational materials devoted to science in the country
features.OPENING_HOURS: Science Centre Singapore Daily, 10am - 6pm(last admission: 5.15pm) .Omni Theatre Daily, 12pm - 6pm (last show: 6pm) . Snow City Daily, 10am - 6pm (last admission: 5pm) School and public holidays, 10am - 7pm (last admission: 6pm)

features.Name: kml_72
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Marvel at the Fuk Tak Chi Museum's carefully restored architecture in the heart of Chinatown
features.pageTitle: Fuk Tak Chi Museum & Places of Interest
features.overview: Fuk Tak Chi Museum was once the oldest Chinese temple in Singapore and is an elegant example of restored architecture in Chinatown
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Fuk Tak Chi Museum was once the oldest Chinese temple in Singapore and is an elegant example of restored architecture in Chinatown

features.Name: kml_73
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Marvel at antiques and heirlooms worthy of any museum collection at the Katong Antique House
features.pageTitle: Katong Antique House Singapore: Peranakan Heritage
features.overview: Step into this fully restored bona fide Peranakan family home, and admire the many antiques and heirlooms worthy of any museum collection
features.META_DESCRIPTION: Step into this fully restored bona fide Peranakan family home, and admire the many antiques and heirlooms worthy of any museum collection

features.Name: kml_74
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Step back in time to ancient China at the beautiful Chinese Garden, Singapore
features.overview: A tranquil patch of imperial China in the west of Singapore is pleasant respite from the bustle of the city
features.META_DESCRIPTION: A tranquil patch of imperial China in the west of Singapore is pleasant respite from the bustle of the city

features.Name: kml_75
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Whether you prefer water sports, rollerblading or cycling, find a myriad of things to do at East Coast Park, Singapore
features.ADDRESS: Along East Coast Parkway and East Coast Park Service Road
features.overview: With so many attractions packed into this 15-km stretch of beaches, you'll never run out of things to do
features.META_DESCRIPTION: With so many attractions packed into the 15-km stretch of beaches at East Coast Park, you'll never run out of things to do

features.Name: kml_76
features.IMAGE_ALT_TEXT: Take a stroll back in time at Fort Canning Park, Singapore - a landmark full of history
features.ADDRESS: Bounded by Hill Street, Canning Rise, Clemenceau Avenue and River Valley Road
